summary: Add a test to verify that workflows using randomness produce different values after reset-point resets. The test should run a workflow with random inputs to activities, reset at a midpoint, and confirm that pre-reset values remain the same while post-reset values differ.
userImpact: Users need test coverage to ensure workflow resets properly update randomness seeds and produce different results after reset points.
proposedFix: Create a test workflow that executes activities with random-generated inputs, record the history, reset the workflow between two activities, re-execute, and assert that pre-reset values match but post-reset values differ.
keyQuote: Add a test that will confirm post-reset-point workflows have a different update seed.
